summary: The Service Areas section component is implemented with the required responsive 8-card grid, English headline/footnote, and orange/blue accent grouping. However, the diff also introduces unrequested backend and Internet Identity/auth + actor/query infrastructure, which conflicts with stated non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Added Internet Identity authentication context/provider and related login/identity management hooks, despite non-goal explicitly disallowing Internet Identity auth.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals include "Adding Internet Identity authentication"; diff introduces InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook and wires it into the app root.

hallucinated_features.description: Added actor-creation/query layer using React Query for backend actor management.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; the BuildRequest is only about a frontend section UI and explicitly excludes backend/API work for service areas.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a backend canister file (empty actor).
hallucinated_features.reason: Backend work is outside the requested scope (frontend section only) and explicitly a non-goal to add backend data storage/APIs for service areas.
